name: letterer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who creates the text for a comic or graphic novel (= a book whose story is told in pictures): He was a letterer on black and white comic strips. Letterers do the script in the balloons.
More examplesFewer examplesHe teamed up with a penciller, inker, and letterer to make "Adventures" a reality.Producing this colourful weekly comic required a small army of artists, writers, and letterers. Johnston's typeface was a brilliant shock to type designers, letterers, printers, and graphic artists worldwide.
